title: More superb connectivity issues

embed.description: See posts, photos and more on Facebook.

body:
I sat through leavebusters 20 minute penalty queue twice to be met with connection issues. I have full bars, everything should be running smoothly - I am almost entirely sure this is an issue on your end and I'm really getting tired of it.

-Onwodori

replies.body:
First things first, Facebook links like that aren't going to work for the general audience. Feel free to shoot me another working link using something like gyazo or imgur. 

Even if your network router or connectivity status has full bars, that doesn't actually mean you're going to have flawless internet. It's not uncommon at all for people to have a high download speed and still have problems reaching certain servers due to ISP routing or improper network settings. Start off by adjusting your network settings, specifically Port Forwarding and DNS settings as those tend to have a good deal of luck. You can find those steps outlined in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
